chandbas.h

00001 
00002 
00003 /*
00004 Program                 CHANDLER.H
00005 Purpose                 Commandhandler between userinterface and commands (header)
00006                                         This file is the buffer between every command generator
00007                                         and the internal structures. It's platform independed.
00008                                         It's used by MainWindow
00009                                         This file also calls functions from the mainwindow. See
00010                                         the documentation for more details about these functions.
00011 Last Update             20-12-1995
00012 */
00013 
00014 #ifndef CHANDBAS_H
00015 #define CHANDBAS_H
00016 
00017 #ifdef __GNUG__
00018 #pragma interface
00019 #endif
